Discussions.Discussion_Name: Session on Monday, July 15th - reading materials

Messages.Author: Susanne Bettina Ress
Messages.Content: Dear students, Sylwia has provided us with some readings to go with her presentation in the last session of the seminar. Please read it before class. https://archive2013-2020.ctm-festival.de/news-mobile/white-brothers-with-no-soul-un-tuning-the-historiography-of-berlin-techno/ See you on Monday. Very best Susanne

Messages.Author: Susanne Bettina Ress
Messages.Content: Dear students, Some reading materials have been added to the upcoming session. Please explore them before class. Our Norwegian colleagues will lead an activity to learn more about Norway's Indigenous people. Have a nice weekend! Susanne

Messages.Author: Susanne Bettina Ress
Messages.Content: Dear students, Please read the chapter "Contamination as Collaboration" from Anna Tsing's "The Mushroom at the end of the World" (2021). It has now been posted. I have also posted a podcast that is an interview with Anna Tsing, in case you prefer to listen. See you on Monday! Susanne

Messages.Author: Susanne Bettina Ress
Messages.Content: Dear students, please look through the materials on ISIS and remember, we meet in FH 502. Very best Susanne

Messages.Author: Susanne Bettina Ress
Messages.Content: Dear students, I have posted materials for next week's class on Ubuntu. Kindly read the materials BEFORE class. We will welcome Dr. Majee as guest. Very best Susanne

Messages.Author: Susanne Bettina Ress
Messages.Content: Dear all, This is to remind you that we will meet at 12pm at the main entrace of "Haus der Kulturen der Welt" on 13.05.2024 for our excursion to visit the exhibition "Echos of Brotherlands".  Please engage with the following website in preparation: https://bruderland.de/en/episodes/routes-to-the-gdr/  Develop at least TWO QUESTIONS that you would like to discuss on Monday.  Have a nice weekend. Susanne
